mapper.select: select post_num, title, content, writer, reg_date, views, COMMENT_COUNT, notice, url FROM VIDEO WHERE AND notice=0 ORDER by post_num desc LIMIT #{postBeginPoint}, #{displayPostLimit}

sql.if: title like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') or content like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VIDEO(TITLE, WRITER, REG_DATE, VIEWS, CONTENT, COMMENT_COUNT, NOTICE, url) VALUES(#{title}, #{writer}, NOW(), 0, #{content}, 0, #{notice}, #{url})
mapper.select: select count(*) from video WHERE AND notice=0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VIDEO_COMMENT(POST_NUM, ID, REG_DATE, CONTENT) VALUES(#{postNum}, #{id}, NOW(), #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.POST_NUM, A.COMMENT_NUM, A.ID, A.REG_DATE, A.CONTENT, B.NICKNAME FROM VIDEO_COMMENT A INNER JOIN MEMBER B ON A.ID=B.ID WHERE A.POST_NUM=#{postNum} ORDER BY A.COMMENT_NUM DESC) C ORDER BY COMMENT_NUM LIMIT #{postBeginPoint}, #{display}
mapper.update: UPDATE VIDEO SET COMMENT_COUNT= (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VIDEO_COMMENT WHERE POST_NUM=#{postNum}) WHERE POST_NUM=#{postNum}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM video_views WHERE POST_NUM=#{postNum} AND IP=#{ip}
